::Slayer::

As he flew toward the Maximal base, Slayer's scanners reported a pod 
falling nearby. He stops in the air.

"Ignatius," he says into his comm, "I just picked up a new pod on the 
scanners. I think a new bot would be usefull for us right now."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> New Bot
> 
> 
> 
> (A stasis pod plummits from the sky. It picks up speed as it goes. 
Till it crashes to the ground, deep in the forest. It starts scanning 
for a beast mode....)
